casebody.data:
INDEMNITY INSURANCE COMPANY OF NORTH AMERICA, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. TOWN OF MILFORD and John E. Philo, Defendants-Appellees. No. 61, Docket 23158. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Dec. 7, 1954. Decided Dec. 31, 1954. Morris Tyler, New Haven, Conn. (John H. Filer and Gumbart, Corbin, Tyler & Cooper, New Haven, Conn., on the brief), for plaintiff-appellant. Richard H. Lynch, Milford, Conn., for defendants-appellees.

Before CLARK, Chief Judge, and MEDINA and HARLAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed on the opinion of District Judge Smith, 127 F.Supp. 394.
